alert.note: Alert for Belmont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:49AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by previous excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Belmont. * WHEN...Until noon EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 948 AM EST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen and has resulted in Wheeling Creek below Blaine to rise to Minor Flood. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Clairsville and Neffs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
